summary:
This mod re-introduces the classic way to level up to your favorite game that is Skyrim.
Back to the basics, ladies and gentlemen !
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/WHUM3nu.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]This mod was greatly inspired by Chesko\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25469/?]Reflection[/url]. This is an awesome mod that you should use as well, in addition to this one ![/center]
[center]Also available on
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=188291824][img]http://torchlight.incgamers.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/Workshop.jpg[/img][/url][/center]


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/W6bj0zM.jpg[/img][/center]

This mod re-introduces the classic way to level up to your favorite game that is Skyrim.
When you level up, you will be able to choose between Magicka/Health/Stamina, as always. 
As soon as you\'ve done that, you will be thrown back to the game and you will not be able to spend your perk points right away. Instead, a message will appear:
[quote]You should rest and meditate on what you have learned[/quote]

If you want to use your perk points, you\'ll have to find a bed and sleep there. You\'ll be able to spend your perk points; a message will confirm that.

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/tTroym9.jpg[/img][/center]

[list]
[*] This mod requires [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]Skyrim Script Extender[/url].
[*] Put the BSA and ESP files in your DATA folder, or use the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager//?]Nexus Mod Manager[/url].
[*] In case you want to uninstall this mod, go sleep (your character, not you, duh) if you want your perk points back, save your game, exit and delete all the mod\'s files.
[/list]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/BHDnuWB.jpg[/img][/center]

[list]
[*]There\'s no compatibility issue to be noted at this moment. No vanilla form has been modified.[/list]

[center]Enjoy ![/center]

[center][img]http://fc09.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2012/059/7/6/skyrim_png_by_meridiann-d4r9l59.png[/img][/center]
author: Sagittarius22

files.name: Classic Level Up
files.changelogHtml: Will not close the tutorial message anymore.
